attributes.action: Immediately deport Geoffrey Prime to Russia.
attributes.additional_details: This is a man who betrayed this country and its people and now he is kept alive by payments of taxpayer pounds taken under threat of criminalisation from the people of this country.  If he was good enough to be a spy (an employee) for Russia then Russia should be good enough to keep its employees in their dotage. Immediate deportation to Moscow is the absolute minimum that is necessary in this case.  How he fares once dumped on the runway in Moscow is a problem for him, not for the taxpayers of this country.
